conversations.content: You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What happens if I click "Accept all" on the website?
By clicking "Accept all," you consent to the transfer of usage data to the DAAD and third parties, where there's no data protection level comparable to EU law.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
How can I manage my cookie preferences?
You can find selection options and explanations under "Cookies" at the end of the page, where you can adjust consent for future processing.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Is my data protected to EU standards if I accept all cookies?
No, the text states there’s no level of data protection comparable to EU law when data is transferred to DAAD or third parties.

Avoid clicking "Accept all" and instead customize your preferences under the "Cookies" section at the end of the page.
